contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.blogpos.BlogPostContentContentMarkdown: Welcome to one of Kentico’s Product Insights videos. The series is designed to keep you up-to-date with how to solve marketing challenges using Xperience by Kentico. Join Dave as he shows you how to get subscribers into your contact list, how to avoid emailing unsubscribed contacts, and why you should use bounce monitoring in Xperience by Kentico. Check out our new hybrid headless solution, and see how it’s being designed to empower marketers to reuse more of their content within both structured and traditional WYSIWYG approaches to content authoring.
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.blogpos.BlogPostContentShortDescription: In this Product Insight video, we look at email marketing. Our lead product strategist shares tips and tricks on how to use email marketing efficiently.
